title: Fennel and lemon risotto, Parmesan crisps and fennel fritters
description: Fennel and lemon bring a zesty aniseed vibe to this classic Italian dish and the simple fennel fritters bring a touch of sophistication.
ingredients: ½ tsp dried red chilli flakes
1½ large fennel bulbs, finely chopped, fronds kept for garnish
1 unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest and juice
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ large fennel bulb, cut into thin wedges
